item.title: Nerve injuries can trigger hidden immune changes throughout the entire body

item.description: Fossils from Qatar have revealed a small, newly identified sea cow species that lived in the Arabian Gulf more than 20 million years ago. The site con...

item.title: A silent ocean pandemic is wiping out sea urchins worldwide
item.description: A sudden, unexplained mass die-off is decimating sea urchins around the world, including catastrophic losses in the Canary Islands. Key reef-grazing s...

item.title: Stressed rats keep returning to cannabis and scientists know why
